notes: Successive attacks with Ballista do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration and knockback instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
The target is not disabled during the knockback, so they still can cast spells or items, attack and turn during the push. This means it does not cancel channeling spells of the target.
abilities.description: Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 30 pure damage with every attack.

info: Stacks with all other attack range bonuses.
Affects the cast range of active attack modifiers as well.
